entry.title: microsoft/microsoft-ui-xaml - Releases - 2024-02-13
entry.content:
WinUI 3 in WinAppSDK 1.5-preview1

The source code for the version of WinUI 3 in the WinAppSDK 1.5-preview1 is available. 1.5-preview1 is a preview release for the WinAppSDK that includes bug fixes for 1.4 and provides early access to new APIs and features for WinUI 3, System Backdrops, Content, Windowing, Input, and Controls.

Check out our release notes for the list of fixed issues and new APIs in this release.

Download the NuGet package for 1.5-preview1 here: https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK/1.5.240205001-preview1.
